articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Venezuela 
    Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's famous work "Let's Bring the Superiority of Our People's Power into Fuller Play" was brought out in booklet by the Cantaclaro Publishing House of Venezuela on September 9.
 The work, released on December 21, Juche 81 (1992), is a famous work which comprehensively expounds the principles, tasks and ways of building the people's power for the world progressives fighting to defend the socialist cause.

articles.title: Total Abolition of "Security Law" Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
S. Korean Trade Unions Agree on Joint Struggle 
    Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions and the Federation of south Korean Trade Unions agreed on September 22 on launching a joint struggle to demand the withdrawal of the "bill on protecting part-time jobs" by the government, according to south Korean MBC.
 For this, the organizations decided to form a working-level joint promotion group to agree upon details of the struggle and discuss ways of struggle including the schedule and scale of rallies and a joint general strike through a working meeting.
